field.comment: Date that this record was created.

field.comment: Contact Name, always formatted as LAST NAME, FIRST NAME

No, Not part of POR program/Customer does not have an active payment agreement

field.comment: For IL only. IL - indicates a customers POR class

number of days an account is past due

option.comment: De-Energized (814_24, indicate D to bypass CSA relationship)

field.comment: Percent of Load service by Supplier; Default to 1
Percent of Load Eligible for Choice
Tax exempt Percent; 1 means 100% tax exempt; Used for MD sales tax exempt
MD/DE only - nr of air conditioners on load mgt program
MD/DE only - nr of water heaters on load mgt program

record.rec-id: rec-id 5 DTE M> O "DTE" - Date Information

field.comment: Service Start, Next Read, Restoration Date
Optional for SR request; off-cycle read time for Maine

option.comment: estimated meter read date that service with Supplier will end
estimated date of drop to be sent to Supplier
project date of 814 C to switch from UCB to DUAL
allows you to request a future (up to 45 days) on-cycle drop date
allows you to request a future (up to 45 days) on cycle enrollment
estimated date of drop to be sent to Supplier

field.comment: usage and interval that a meter is read; i.e. KHMON, K1030
corresponds to ERCOT defined load profiles
corresponds to ERCOT defined load profiles
the cycle number when meter is read; for unmetered the billing cycle will be sent
corresponds to ERCOT defined load profiles
designates configuration of Meter (including advance meter) - see values on codes tab
corresponds to ERCOT defined load profiles
Loss Factor - used by First Energy
day of month meter will be read
